mapper.insert: insert into user_bill (login_name, order_id, amount, balance, freeze, operation_type, business_type, operator_login_name, intervention_reason, created_time) value(#{loginName}, #{orderId}, #{amount}, #{balance}, #{freeze}, #{operationType}, #{businessType}, #{operatorLoginName}, #{interventionReason}, #{createdTime})
mapper.select: SELECT IFNULL(SUM(`amount`), 0) FROM user_bill WHERE user_bill.`business_type` IN ('ACTIVITY_REWARD', 'REFERRER_REWARD') AND user_bill.`login_name` = #{loginName}
